articles.description: Follow action from Saturday's five games in the Premier League including Brentford v Liverpool, Arsenal v Aston Villa and Leicester City v Fulham.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Newcastle vs Bournemouth, Brentford vs Liverpool, Arsenal vs Aston Villa - scores & radio

articles.description: Substitute Darwin Nunez scores a late double to guide Liverpool to victory at Brentford and extend their lead at the top of the Premier League table to seven points.
articles.title: Brentford 0-2 Liverpool: Darwin Nunez scores late double in Premier League

articles.description: Watch or listen to Open All Mics, see in-play goal clips and follow live text updates from the fourth round of the Scottish Cup.
articles.title: Scottish Cup fourth round - radio, text & in-play clips: BBC Sport

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as Everton take on Aston Villa in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: Women's Super League LIVE: Everton vs Aston Villa live text, score

articles.description: Two goals from Jean-Philippe Mateta give Crystal Palace victory over West Ham in the Premier League.
articles.title: West Ham 0-2 Crystal Palace: Jean-Philippe Mateta's double seals win

articles.description: American skiing legend Lindsey Vonn explains why she returned to racing after a near six-year absence.
articles.title: Lindsey Vonn: American on skiing comeback which has 'exceeded' her expectations and could lead to Olympics

articles.description: Shaun Murphy compiles only the sixth 147 maximum break in the history of the Masters, in his semi-final match against Mark Allen.
articles.title: Murphy makes 147 maximum break in Masters semi-final against Allen

articles.description: Leon Goretzka scores twice as Bayern Munich held on against Wolfsburg to go seven points clear at the top of the Bundesliga table.
articles.title: Bayern Munich 3-2 Wolfsburg: Leon Goretzka scores twice for Bundesliga leaders

articles.description: England's Tyrrell Hatton - one shot off leader Daniel Hillier - is spoken to after his third round at the Dubai Desert Classic for smashing a tee marker.
articles.title: Dubai Desert Classic: Tyrrell Hatton one off lead despite smashing tee marker

articles.description: Follow live text commentary from the EFL Championship with 10 games taking place, starting with three lunchtime kick-offs including Cardiff City v Swansea City.
articles.title: EFL Championship LIVE: Follow live text commentary and score updates across 10 matches
